document_data.name: Temple of Beauty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Beauty''' was a temple of [[Sune]] in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: [[File:CoSW-TempleOfBeauty.png|thumb|right|270px|''Map showing location of the Temple of Beauty (labeled $10) ''circa'' 1372 DR.'']] This temple stood in the [[Sea Ward of Waterdeep|Sea Ward]] district of the city, next to [[Gauntyl Villa]].
document_data.Structure: This was a rather lavish temple,
document_data.Services: Like many temples in the city, this structure offered healing services.<ref>
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1363}}, the clergy of his temple sponsored a ship known as ''[[Goddess' Glory]]'' alongside [[Maxtilar Rhebbos]] of the [[House of Heroes]]. This ship was meant to deliver a load of precious statuary to the Temple of Beauty, but it mysteriously sank just south of the city. Unbeknownst to them, the sinking of the ''Goddess' Glory'' was caused by [[Kerritas Reefsilver]], a member of the [[Cult of Ao]], and two [[merfolk]]. They pilfered the statuary to place in a small temple to [[Deep Sashelas]], situated in an underwater reef just outside of the [[Deepwater Harbor]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/94/The Cult of Ao: Who Watches Those who Watch over You?|12-13}}
document_data.Inhabitants: In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], this temple was led by the High Priestess [[Ssaeryl Shadowstar]].
